entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:22 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow Grains, -32.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 02:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Snow Grains
Temperature: -32.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -35.5°C
Wind: WNW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
